events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but would like to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The case has been classified under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to dissatisfaction with the product.
Assigning the case to support agent Lisa M. who specializes in refund requests for apparel products.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been opened or worn?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is still unopened and in its original packaging as I wanted to make sure the refund was possible first.
Thank you for the details. We can process the refund once the unopened jacket is returned to us. I will email you the return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and support. I appreciate you sending the return label for the jacket.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. The amount should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to ensure the refund has appeared on your statement and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Closing this case as resolved. Please contact us again if you have any further questions or issues regarding your orders.
